activities: Verifi uses information from a secure payment page to process credit card information. We collect customer information including name, address, phone number and credit card number in order to process payments for purchases of goods and services from merchants using our service.
corpofftitle1: Chief Operations Officer and General Counsel
personaldata: Name, address, phone number, merchant information, credit card number, purchase information
recoursemech:
Verifi has committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the Safe Harbor Principles to JAMS, an independent dispute resolution services company that provides Safe Harbor dispute resolution services. If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint, or if your complaint is not satisfactorily addressed by Verifi, you may contact JAMS at:

 

JAMS
1920 Main Street
Suite 300
Irvine, CA 92614
SafeHarbor@jamsadr.com
